mcq.statement: Which council awarded Hilal-e-Kashmir posthumously to Naik Saif Ali Janjua Shaheed on March 14, 1949?

options.b: Defence Council of Azad Jammu and Kashmir

mcq.one_liner: On March 14, 1949, the **Defence Council of Azad Jammu and Kashmir** posthumously awarded Hilal-e-Kashmir to Naik Saif Ali Janjua Shaheed.

suggestions.topic: Accession of Junagadh and Kashmir Conflict
